name: prepared
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 ready to deal with a situation: When she called on me, I wasn't prepared. They were prepared for the worst.
B2 made earlier: The spokesperson read a prepared statement. be prepared to do something
B2 to be willing, or happy to agree to do something: Would you be prepared to help me get things ready for the party?
